---

<p align="center" style="font-size:15px;">
  Watch our interview with Fox KTVU where we talk about leading the 2024-2025 Bay Area Heat Mapping Campaign, which is part of the National Oceanic Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) Urban Heat Island Mapping initiative. Together with local cities, community organizations, and volunteers, we will map the distribution of heat throughout Palo Alto, East Palo Alto, and Menlo Park.
</p>

<p align="center">
  <iframe scrolling="no" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen webkitallowfullscreen mozallowfullscreen allow="autoplay; fullscreen" src="https://w3.mp.lura.live/player/3.12.16/v3/anvload.html?%" width="640" height="360"></iframe>
</p>
